author: schor
msg: [UIMA-4083][UIMA-4082] fix serialization issue with FSs that are both ref'd and indexed, and add tests.  Change serialization format for @views to use the ViewName as the key, instead of the corresponding Sofa Xmi Id.

author: dennisl
msg: Remove <phase>validate</phase> from the pom.xml example, since it is not needed. It is the default phase for the toolchains-maven-plugin.

author: covener
msg: namded captures show up in the env with a MATCH_ prefix.

author: covener
msg: namded captures show up in the env with a MATCH_ prefix.

author: rec
msg: [UIMA-3024] CASDumpWriter is sensitive to type system changes
- Added parameter to sort annotations instead of relying on index order. Disabled by default because it is assumed that client configures index order using type priorities.
